TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextAttribute extends Java.Text.AttributedCharacterIteratorAttribute

Docs.summary: The TextAttribute class defines attribute keys and attribute values for text rendering.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant UNDERLINE text attribute.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant UNDERLINE_LOW_DASHED indicates single pixel dashed low underline.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant UNDERLINE_LOW_DOTTED indicates a single pixel dotted low underline.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant UNDERLINE_LOW_GRAY indicates double pixel gray low underline.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant UNDERLINE_LOW_ONE_PIXEL indicates a single pixel solid low underline.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant UNDERLINE_LOW_TWO_PIXEL indicates a double pixel solid low underline.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant UNDERLINE_ON indicates a standard underline at the roman baseline for roman text.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The WEIGHT text attribute.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_BOLD indicates the standard bold weight.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_DEMIBOLD indicates a lighter weight than BOLD.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_DEMILIGHT indicates an intermediate weight between LIGHT and STANDARD.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_EXTRABOLD indicates an extra heavy weight.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_EXTRA_LIGHT indicates the lightest predefined weight.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_HEAVY indicates a heavier weight than BOLD.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_LIGHT indicates the standard light weight.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_MEDIUM indicates average weight between the REGULAR and BOLD.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_REGULAR indicates the standart weight.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_SEMIBOLD indicates a semi weight of REGULAR.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WEIGHT_ULTRABOLD indicates the heaviest predefined weight.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The WIDTH text attribute.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WIDTH_CONDENSED indicates the most condensed predefined width.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WIDTH_EXTENDED indicates extended width.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WIDTH_REGULAR indicates the standard width.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WIDTH_SEMI_CONDENSED indicates a semi condensed width.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The Constant WIDTH_SEMI_EXTENDED indicates semi extended width.
